alert.note: Alert for Seneca; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Seneca and northeastern Yates Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ferguson Corners, or near Penn Yan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Romulus, Benton, Rushville, Kendaia, Ferguson Corners, Yatesville, Sampson State Park, Border City and Rose Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
